0.1.name: wordpress/youtube-channel-showcase
0.1.description:
Youtube channel gallery - displays list of youtube videos from a channel and showcases a selected video at the top which can be rotated

Recent Updates

Patch applied to improve the regex for selecting videos (thanks albertocm) - 12th Feb 2012

Limitations of this version

The following will require css to be created by the user Styling the videos to have more than 1 on each line Resizing the showcase or thumbnails from the default size

Get in touch

Email Me
